name: HouseElspeth1
_source: s;Elspeth;I remember this place.{w} This is{br}Orla's family home, is it not?
# She trips and knocks something over

s;Elspeth;Goddess, what was...?{w} An old cane?|{c:expression;Elspeth;HalfCloseEyes}This must've been her father's,|before he passed.{w}{c:expression;Elspeth;CloseEyes} Such a shame...{w}{clear}Theirs was such a bright family{br}before everything happened...
s;SElspeth;Shh, shh.{w} Just lie there, okay?|I've got you.{w} Try to get some rest.
s;SElspeth;I know, dear.{w} I know.{w} I can't make{br}the pain stop, but I can dull it.
s;SOrla;You.{w} You've got some answering to do.
s;SElspeth;Orla, you can't keep coming in here!{w}{clear}Your father needs peace, and rest!
s;SOrla;What he needs is to be cured!|So what's the hold-up?{w} Tell me!|You need more coin? Is that it?|You want me to pay up for you?
s;SElspeth;Orla, please.{w} You know I'm not in{br}this for the money.{w} I'm trying to-

s;SOrla;To what, Elspeth?{w} Rip us off?{w} Rob{br}us blind while my father rots!?{w}{clear}Just name your price, then.{w} I'll{br}pay it.{w} A hundred gold.{w} A thousand.{w}{clear}I don't care what it costs, just{br}give us our life back, damn you!
s;SElspeth;That's enough!{w} I will not be spoken{br}to like this!{w} Stop your shouting!{w}{clear}Your father does not deserve to{br}be witness to this kind of outburst.
s;SOrla;...{w} What he deserves is to live.|But	fine.{w} I'll pipe down for now.{w}{clear}Now it's your turn{semicolon}{w} what's the hold{br}up, and what do you want from me?
s;SElspeth;I don't know how to tell you this...|I'm already doing all I can.{w}{clear}Your father is...{w} not long for this{br}world.{w} Peace is all I can grant him.
s;SOrla;So, what, you're saying he's dead?
s;SElspeth;I'm saying he's dying.{w} And that it{br}cannot be stopped.{w} Not even by me.

s;SOrla;But that's...{w}{c:expression;SOrla;OpenEyes} that's ridiculous.{w}{clear}{c:bop_portrait;SOrla}Mom needs him!{w} He's gotta work the{br}carpentry shop, it's...{w} it's his job!{w}{clear}A-and he's just sick!{w} He can't be{br}dying, he's...{w} he's my dad.{w} He's...
s;SElspeth;...{w} I'm sorry, Orla.{w}{c:expression;SElspeth;HalfCloseEyes} I tried.{w} All I{br}can do is make his exit peaceful.
s;SOrla;But that's not enough!{w} That's...{w}{clear}I have gold.{w} I have lots of gold,{br}I can give you anything you need!|If it will save him, I'll do it!
s;SElspeth;You know that's not going to work.
s;SOrla;But I...{w} there has to be a way...|there has to...{w} I-I can't...

s;Elspeth;...{w} O Goddess...{w} Hopeless though my{br}quest may be...{w} grant me this wish.{w}{clear}{c:expression;Elspeth;HalfCloseEyes}Grant me the power to protect those{br}closest to me, here at the end.{w}{clear}I can't keep failing them.{w} Please.{w}{clear}I give all of myself unto you, as I{br}have for all my life, all for this{semicolon}|one single boon is all I ask.
s;Elspeth;G-Goddess!? The cane, it's...!{w}{clear}I understand. This is not just a{br}gift from you, but from him, too?{w}{clear}Then I will make you both proud{br}with what little life I have left.
